data.persona: I like to be active. I am cold-blooded. I like to keep my body warm. I can even break my tail.
data.description:
You are in the cavern.
a lonely and isolated place, a cavernous hole in the side of a craggy mountain that leads to a network of underground tunnels.
There's a soul, a Tooth, a tunnel, and a hole here.
The goblins is here.

You are carrying nothing.
